definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The most beautiful cloud is cirrus .
Watch the flowers as they bloom and droop outside your door;
sentences.chinese: 闲看庭前花开花落，漫随天外云卷云舒。

sentences.english: Hexagonal ice crystal are the basic form of the particles in cirrus.
sentences.chinese: 六角柱冰晶是卷云中粒子的基本形态。

sentences.english: They are no different from the cirrus clouds that naturally form in that region of the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 他们无异于任何附近大气层自然形成的卷云。

sentences.english: I have witnessed the clouds gather and disperse, the flowers bloom and wither.
sentences.chinese: 我见证了云卷云舒，花开花落。

sentences.english: Flower, reciprocal, clouds scud across, is one year.
sentences.chinese: 花开花谢，此消彼长，云卷云舒，又是一年。

sentences.english: It contains rolling green hills and a blue sky with stratocumulus and cirrus clouds.
sentences.chinese: 它包含起伏的绿色山丘和层积云和卷云与蓝色的天空。

sentences.english: Accidentally, hope heaven emanates leisurely clouds scud across the artistic conception.
sentences.chinese: 去留无意，望天上云卷云舒的闲适意境。

definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
